channel.title: Elmore County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Elmore County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-78 West - Owyhee County/Snake River
item.description: Entering Owyhee County on ID-78 West at the Snake River bridge.

item.title: ID-78 West - Hammett
item.description: ID-78 West in Hammett

item.title: ID-78 West - Snow Plow Hours
item.description: ID-78 West - Normal Snow Removal Hours between 6 AM and 6 PM between Hammett and Bruneau.

item.title: ID-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-78 west. Distance to Bruneau and Elko (Nevada).

item.title: Hammett Hill Road at I-84/US-30/(US-26)/ID-78
item.description: Hammett Hill Road at I-84/US-30/(US-26)/ID-78 junction. Use I-84 west for Mountain Home and Boise. Continue over freeway for I-84/US-30/US-26 East to Twin Falls.

item.title: Old Oregon Trail Road at I-84 West
item.description: Old Oregon Trail Road at I-84/US-30/(US-26) West. Use I-84 west to Meridian and Boise.

item.title: Old Oregon Trail Road at I-84
item.description: Old Oregon Trail Road at I-84 (Exit 99). Use I-84 East for Hammett and Twin Falls. Continue over freeway for I-84 East to Boise.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 74
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 74 - Simco Road. Mile marker 74.

item.title: End ID-78 East at I-84 West
item.description: End ID-78 East at I-84 West. Use I-84 west for Mountain Home and Boise. Continue straight for Old Oregon Trail Road.

item.title: Old US-30 West Approaching ID-78
item.description: Old US-30 West approaching ID-78 in Hammett. Turn left for ID-78 west to Bruneau. Continue straight for ID-78 east to Mountain Home.

item.title: Cold Springs Road at Old US-30
item.description: Cold Springs Road at Old US-30. Turn right for ID-78, I-84, and Hammett.

item.title: (Old) Hwy 30 Shield
item.description: (Old) Hwy 30 Shield on King Hill Highway.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30
item.description: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left on I-84/US-30 west towards Boise and Mountain Home. Continue straight ahead for Old US-30 towards King Hill.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84
item.description: End BL-84 East at I-84/US-30 junction (Exit 121). Turn right for I-84/US-30 East to Bliss and Twin Falls. Roadway continues as Old US-30 to King Hill.

item.title: ID-78 - Hammett
item.description: ID-78 in Hammett. Turn left to continue west on ID-78.

item.title: ID-78 West - Hammett
item.description: Entering Hammett on ID-78 west. Speed Limit 35 MPH.

item.title: ID-78 West - Hammett
item.description: ID-78 west in Hammett

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 112 at ID-78
item.description: I-84 East Exit 112 at ID-78. Turn right on ID-78/To (Old) US-30 for Hammett. Turn left for Old Oregon Trail Road.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114 - Cold Springs Road

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114 - Cold Springs Road.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114 - Cold Springs Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 112
item.description: I-84 East approaching Exit 112 - ID-78/Hammett. This new style of black and white shield has been showing up on guide signs in the last few years.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84 (Exit 90)
item.description: End BL-84 east at I-84, Exit 90 onramps. Use I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 east for Twin Falls; use I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 west for Boise. This is the western end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 West/To I-84
item.description: BL-84 West/To I-84 on the west side of Mountain Home.

item.title: BL-84 West at ID-51 - Mountain Home
item.description: BL-84 west at ID-51 in Mountain Home (American Legion Blvd. at N 2nd E). Turn right on N 2nd E to continue west on BL-84 and for I-84 and Boise. Continue straight for ID-51 south to Mountain Home AFB, Bruneau, and Duck Valley (Indian Reservation).

item.title: BL-84 West at ID-51 - Mountain Home
item.description: BL-84 West at ID-51 in Mountain Home. Turn right on on N 2nd East to continue west on BL-84 and for I-84.

item.title: BL-84 West - Mountain Home
item.description: BL-84 West along American Legion Blvd. in Mountain Home.

item.title: US-20 East - Elmore County
item.description: US-20 shield, just east of Mountain Home.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84 (Exit 90)
item.description: End BL-84 east at I-84, Exit 90 onramps. Use I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 east for Twin Falls; use I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 west for Boise. This is the western end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 West Approaching I-84
item.description: BL-84 west approaching I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 in Mountain Home. This is the western end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 West/To I-84
item.description: BL-84 West/To I-84 on the west side of Mountain Home.

item.title: ID-51 North at BL-84
item.description: ID-51 North (Old US-30) at BL-84. Turn right on American Legion Blvd. for BL-84 east; continue straight for BL-84 west.

item.title: ID-51 North At Old US-30
item.description: ID-51 north at Old US-30. Use Old US-30 for I-84 eastbound access. Continue north on ID-51 for I-84, BL-84, Boise, Glenns Ferry, and Twin Falls. This intersection used to route Twin Falls traffic along Old US-30, but has recently been changed to route traffic along the business loop.

item.title: ID-51 North at ID-67
item.description: ID-51 north at ID-67. Turn left for ID-67 east to US Ecology Idaho Waste Site and Mountain Home AFB. Turn right on ID-51 north for Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: ID-51 North Approaching ID-67
item.description: ID-51 north approaching ID-67. Turn right to continue north on ID-51; left for ID-67.

item.title: ID-51 North - Entering Elmore County
item.description: Entering Elmore County on ID-51 north, on the bridge over the Snake River.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 95
item.description: I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 east at Exit 95 - US-20 East/To BL-84/Mountain Home/Fairfield. It is unclear why this sign lists I-84 with the text TO, because BL-84 joins I-84 at this interchange. US-20 leaves I-84 eastbound.

item.title: BL-84 East at I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30
item.description: BL-84 east at I-84 west interchange (Exit 95) in Mountain Home. Turn left for I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 west towards Boise. Continue straight ahead for US-20 east to Fairfield. This is the eastern end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 East at I-84/US-20
item.description: BL-84 east at I-84/US-30/US-20/US-26 jct. Turn right for I-84/US-26/US-30 east towards Twin Falls. Continue under overpass for I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 west towards Boise. Continue past intersection for US-20 east towards Fairfield. This is the east end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 East Approaching I-84/US-20
item.description: BL-84 east approaching I-84/US-20 junction (Exit 95) in Mountain Home.

item.title: BL-84 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BL-84 east in Mountain Home. Distance to Hill City, Fairfield, and Sun Valley. All these cities are via US-20 east, which BL-84 turns into.

item.title: BL-84 East - Mountain Home
item.description: BL-84 east (American Legion Blvd.) in Mountain Home.

item.title: S 3rd St. (Old BL-84) at ID-51
item.description: S 3rd St. (Old BL-84) at ID-51 (to BL-84). Turn left for ID-51 south to Mountain Home AFB and Bruneau. Turn right for ID-51 north (to BL-84) to Boise. BL-84 was formerly routed along S 3rd St. into Mountain Home.

item.title: Old US-30 at Old Oregon Trail Road
item.description: Old US-30 at Old Oregon Trail Road. Turn left for I-84 (at Exit 99); turn right for Mountain Home. This is the old Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: BL-84 - Hammett
item.description: BL-84 in Hammett. Turn right to continue west on BL-84 and for I-84.

item.title: BL-84 West at ID-78
item.description: BL-84 west at ID-78 in Hammett. Use ID-78 west for Bruneau; continue west on BL-84 to Mountain Home.

item.title: Old Oregon Trail at BL-84 (1st St.)
item.description: East Old Oregon Trail Highway at BL-84 (1st St) in Glenns Ferry. Turn right to take 1st St. into Glenns Ferry. The 1st St. is part of the Main Oregon Trail Back Country Byway.

item.title: BL-84 West - Main Oregon Trail Back Country Byway
item.description: Turn right on to continue on the Oregon Trail Back Country Byway and BL-84 (Railroad Ave) in Glenns Ferry.

item.title: BL-84 West - Glenns Ferry
item.description: BL-84 west (1st St.) at Railroad Ave. in Glenns Ferry. Turn right on Railroad Ave. to continue on west BL-84.

item.title: BL-84 West - Glenns Ferry
item.description: Speed limit 25 MPH on BL-84 west in Glenns Ferry.

item.title: BL-84 West - Entering Glenns Ferry
item.description: Entering Glenns Ferry, Idaho on BL-84 west - Population 1,611.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84 East and BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84 East/BL-84 junction. Turn left on I-84 east towards Bliss and Twin Falls. Continue straight for BL-84 into Glenns Ferry.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84 junction. Turn right on I-84 west towards Boise. Continue ahead for I-84/BL-84 towards Glenns Ferry and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 129 Offramp
item.description: I-84 west Exit 129 offramp. Turn right for King Hill.

item.title: End BL-84 East at I-84 (Exit 90)
item.description: End BL-84 east at I-84, Exit 90 onramps. Use I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 east for Twin Falls; use I-84/US-20/US-26/US-30 west for Boise. This is the western end of the Mountain Home business loop.

item.title: ID-51 North At Old US-30
item.description: ID-51 north at Old US-30. The Mountain Home business loop used to follow Old US-30 east to I-84. The business loop has been re-routed to follow ID-51 to I-84 instead. Turn right on Old US-30 for I-84 east towards Hammett and Twin Falls. Continue on ID-51 north for I-84/BL-84 and Boise.

item.title: End ID-67 East At ID-51
item.description: End ID-67 east at at ID-51. Use ID-51 south for Bruneau. Use ID-51 north for Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: End ID-67 East at ID-51
item.description: End ID-67 east at ID-51. Turn right for ID-51 south; continue ahead for ID-51 north.

item.title: ID-67 East Approaching ID-51
item.description: ID-67 east approaching ID-51 junction.

item.title: End ID-167 East at ID-67
item.description: End ID-167 east at ID-67. Use ID-67 west for the Airbase (Mountain Home AFB). Use ID-67 east for Mountain Home.

item.title: ID-167 East Approaching ID-67
item.description: ID-167 east approaching ID-67.

item.title: ID-167 East Approaching ID-67
item.description: ID-167 east approaching ID-67. ID-167 ends at ID-67.

item.title: ID-167 East at Mountain Home AFB Grand View Gate
item.description: ID-167 east at Mountain Home AFB, Grand View Gate.

item.title: Simco Road South at ID-167
item.description: Simco Road South at ID-167.

item.title: US-20 West at I-84
item.description: US-20 west at I-84/US-26/US-30. BL-84 begins here and heads into Mountain Home.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-84
item.description: US-20 West approaching I-84 and BL-84. BL-84 was recently shortened, and rerouted to end at Exit 95 instead of Exit 99. This is now the western end of BL-84 in Mountain Home.

item.title: US-20 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-20 west to Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: US-20 West - Tollgate
item.description: US-20 west - Entering of Tollgate.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 95
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 95 - BL-84/US-20/To ID-51/To ID-67/Mountain Home/Fairfield.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 95
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 95 - BL-84/US-20/Mountain Home/Fairfield.

item.title: US-20 East - Mountain Home
item.description: US-20 east in Mountain Home.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 95 Offramp
item.description: I-84 west Exit 95 offramp at ID-51 and US-20. Use ID-51 for Mountain Home AFB and Duck Valley. Use US-20 for Fairfield.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 99
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 99, To ID-51/To ID-67/Mountain Home/Old Oregon Trail Road. In the last few months the BL-84 shield was removed from the interchange.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 90
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 90 - West Mountain Home.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 95
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 95 - US-20/Mountain Home/Fairfield.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 99
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 99, BL-84/To ID-51/To ID-67/Mountain Home/Old Oregon Trail Road.

item.title: I-84 West - Mountain Home Exits
item.description: Mountain Home - Next 3 Exits, on I-84 west.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 112
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 112, Hammett, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114, BL-84/To ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114, BL-84/ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 125
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 125, Paradise Valley, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 129
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 129, King Hill.

item.title: BL-84 - Glenns Ferry
item.description: Bannock St. north at Oregon Trail. Continue north on Bannock St. for BL-84 west (to I-84 west). Turn right on Oregon Trail for I-84 east (via BL-84 east).

item.title: BL-84 East at ID-78
item.description: BL-84 east at ID-78 south to Bruneau, and Bruneau Dunes State Park. ID-78 follows the south side of the Snake River to Marsing.

item.title: End Hammet Business Loop
item.description: End BL-84 at I-84 in Hammett.

item.title: I-84 East at BL-84/To ID-78 East
item.description: I-84 East Exit 112 offramp at BL-84. Turn right on BL-84/To ID-78 for Hammett and Bruneau Dunes State Park. Turn left for Old Oregon Trail Road.

item.title: I-84 West at BL-84/To ID-78
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114 offramp. Turn left for BL-84 West/To ID-78 to Hammett. Turn right for Cold Springs Road.

item.title: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84
item.description: Old US-30 at I-84/BL-84 junction. Turn right on I-84 west towards Boise. Continue ahead for I-84/BL-84 towards Glenns Ferry and Twin Falls.

item.title: Simco Road North at I-84
item.description: Simco Road North at I-84 west to Boise.

item.title: Simco Road North at I-84
item.description: Simco Road North at I-84. Turn right for I-84 east to Mountain Home and Twin Falls. Proceed over freeway for I-84 west to Boise.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121, BL-84/Glenns Ferry

item.title: I-84 West Exit 125
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 125, Paradise Valley

item.title: I-84 West Exit 74
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 74, Simco Road

item.title: I-84 East Exit 129
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 129, King Hill

item.title: I-84 West Exit 112
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 112 - Hammett, at the western end of the Hammett business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 114 - BL-84/To ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett

item.title: I-84 West Exit 114
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 114 - BL-84/ID-78/Cold Springs Road/Hammett at the eastern end of the Hammett business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 121 - BL-84/Glenns Ferry at the eastern end of the Glenns Ferry business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 121
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 121 - BL-84/Glenns Ferry at the eastern end of the Glenns Ferry business loop.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 125
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 125 - Paradise Valley in Elmore County.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 129
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 129 - King Hill in Elmore County.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 74
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 74, Simco Road in Elmore County.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 99 Offramp
item.description: BL-84/To ID-51/To ID-67 to Mountain Home at I-84 Junction

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-84
item.description: US-20 East at I-84 Junction to Boise and Twin Falls

item.title: US-20 West at I-84
item.description: US-20 East at ID-51/I-84 Junction
